entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
